description:
"Brain-like" Knowledge Management Notes


[New] Supports project search and tag search, supports multiple keyword search, separated by commas
[New] Keep Zotero link when exporting docx format files
[Optimize] Supports preference switch, Zotero content is kept in text format by default, and can be turned on to create cards
[Optimize] Matching rules for paired symbols such as single quotes, double quotes, brackets, etc.
[Optimize] PDF loading speed is improved
